## Runtime.RuntimeResourceResolver.resolveAllResourceValues() method

Resolves all matching resource values in priority order. Uses the resource's associated decision to determine all matching candidates based on the current context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolveAllResourceValues<T extends JsonValue = JsonValue>(resource: IRuntimeResource): Result<ReadonlyArray<T>>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

resource


</td><td>

[IRuntimeResource](./ts-res.runtime.iruntimeresource.md)


</td><td>

The [resource](./ts-res.resources.resource.md) to resolve.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;ReadonlyArray&lt;T&gt;&gt;

`Success` with an array of values from all matching candidates in priority order if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if no candidates match or resolution fails.
